version_description: General UI improvements and bug fixes.
Fixed various bugs relating to UI issues on small screens.

Big graphics update! Enjoy the game with a brand new, streamlined UI!

Various bug fixes and improvements.
Welcome to Realm Grinder! Please enjoy this unique and deep idle game with unprecedented levels of choice and customization!

Fixed an issue with the Farm and Mercenary tutorials.
It's now possible to complete a certain secret trophy by clicking the Stats button instead of the Advisor one, which is currently missing. Will be added soon!
Fixed spell tiers autocast behavior.

Added translations to the game for the following languages: Spanish, German, French and Brazilian Portuguese!

Bug fixes:
Fixed Realm Digger description.
Fixed Elven Unique Building upgrade.
Fixed Contingency Bar which was not working as in
Various improvements and bug fixes.

NEW MECHANIC: FACTION LINEAGES. Starting at Reincarnation 60, you will be able to choose a Faction Lineage. You will be able to upgrade your Lineage by spending massive amount of Faction Coins, gaining progressively higher bonuses and unlocking new perks
Fixed an issue with offline earnings that affected some players.

NEW TROPHIES: added an element to most regular trophy series and one new Secret Trophy!
NEW REINCARNATION POWER at Reincarnation 70, increasing research slots for all branches.
Druid L5 Perk reworked: now increases Non-Unique buildings production ba

**Mercenary Research Expansion**
-Brand new research path for the Mercenary faction
-Tons of new trophies and upgrades
-Several balance tweaks

**Angels vs Demons Event**
-Unique limited-time event pitting the Angel and Demon factions ag
Minor bug fixes and balance tweaks.
Minor Bug Fixes

Get ready for a brand new event: Goblin Invasion!

The goblins are invading the realm and either aid the good alliance in fighting them back or the evil alliance in supporting their advance.

Get ready for a brand new event: Goblin Invasion!

The goblins are invading the realm and either aid the good alliance in fighting them back or the evil alliance in supporting their advance.

** Prepare for the Summer Festival event, coming soon! **
- Garner the favor of either the Summeraan or Winterly factions
- With their help gain access to new upgrades and spells in order to boost your production

Get ready for one of the biggest Realm Grinder updates yet!
-Ascension 2 is available to all players R99 or higher!
-Doubles the number of alignments for players to join with the introduction of the Order, Chaos, and Balance alignments.

The Halloween event is coming soon!
We also fixed a variety of bugs and balance issues with the 3.0.0 patch.

The Thanksgiving event will be available shortly!
We also fixed a number of small bugs.
Enjoy a festive holiday event taking place in the kingdom!

Due to the latest change in assistant handling, Titan Challenge 1 and similar effects were suffering from rounding errors. This should have been fixed.
Grand Champion trophies were incorrectly requiring 4 lineage perks since last patch. Fixed.

Dwarven Set base and scaling decreased.

Artifact Set tutorial no longer locks the game if you had already purchased a Set.

Trade Lords formula changed to prevent overflowing. No changes to the upgrade effect. Most of the other logarithmic upgrades have undergone the same change, which should improve performance and avoid overflowing risks.
